subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Daniel Brière broke off negotiations with the Buffalo Sabres and will test the free-agent market when it opens tomorrow. Brière finished 10th in the league with 95 points (32 goals and 63 assists). But Brière’s agent, Pat Brisson, did not rule out a re-signing with Buffalo.
